alldb.table_sql: SELECT PERSON.ID AS ID, PERSON.CUST_ID AS CUSTID, CUST.CUST_NAME AS CUSTNAME, PERSON.PERSON_NAME_ AS PERSONNAME, PERSON.PASSPORT_TYPE AS PASSPORTTYPE, PERSON.ID_CARD_NO AS IDCARDNO, PERSON.SEX_ AS SEX, PERSON.BIRTH_DATE AS BIRTHDATE, PERSON.RELATIONSHIP AS RELATIONSHIP, DICT.NAME_ AS RELATIONSHIPNAME, PERSON.JOBPOSITION AS JOBPOSITION , PERSON.SERVICE_LIFE AS SERVICELIFE, PERSON.MAIN_PERSON_FLAG AS MAINPERSONFLAG, CASE WHEN PERSON.MAIN_PERSON_FLAG=0 THEN '是' WHEN PERSON.MAIN_PERSON_FLAG=1 THEN '否' ELSE NULL END AS MAINPERSONFLAGNAME, PERSON.DOMICILE_PLACE AS DOMICILEPLACE, PERSON.HOME_ADD AS HOMEADD , PERSON.MAIL_ADD AS MAILADD, PERSON.EMAIL_ AS EMAIL, PERSON.POST_CODE AS POSTCODE, PERSON.MOBILE_NUMBER AS MOBILENUMBER, PERSON.PHONE_ AS PHONE, PERSON.CPMEMO AS CPMEMO, PERSON.CREATOR_ AS CREATOR, BASE.REALNAME_ AS USERNAME, SUBSTR(PERSON.CREATE_DATE,0,10) AS CREATEDATE, PERSON.MODIFICATOR_ AS MODIFICATOR, BASE2.REALNAME_ AS MODIFICATORNAME, SUBSTR(PERSON.MODIFY_DATE,0,10) AS MODIFYDATE FROM CUST_RELATED_PERSON PERSON LEFT JOIN CUST_INFO CUST ON PERSON.CUST_ID=CUST.ID LEFT JOIN T_USERS BASE ON PERSON.CREATOR_=BASE.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_USERS BASE2 ON PERSON.MODIFICATOR_=BASE2.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS DICT ON DICT.ID_=PERSON.RELATIONSHIP WHERE 1=1 /~CUST_ID: AND PERSON.CUST_ID LIKE '%{CUST_ID}%'~/
